hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Bottom of the Well# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Lens of Truth#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #Bombchus (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Hylian Shield#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Side Chest

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #the Poacher's Saw#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: Did you know that you can access the Fire Temple boss door without dropping the pillar by using the Hover boots?

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Final Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Green Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Sun Block Room Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Fishing Pond#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# is on the path to #Morpha#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #a Hookshot#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #the Serenade of Water#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Desert Colossus## has #2# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Minuet of Forest#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Heart Container#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #a Deku Shield#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of time.

ToT (Left).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #within the Spirit Trial#, chests contain...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Deku Nut Capacity#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Crystal Switch Chest
Ganons Castle Spirit Trial Invisible Chest

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Song of Storms#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Zora's Domain# is on the way of the hero.

ZD (Mweep).text: Can you move me? I don't get great service here.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #Saria's Song#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: What did Zelda suggest that Link do when diplomacy didn't work?^${12 39 C7}Triforce.
